title: Mentora LMS
description: A full-featured Learning Management System built using MERN stack with role-based dashboards for students, teachers, and admins.

title: Real-Time Multiplayer Chess Game
description: A web-based real-time multiplayer chess application with matchmaking and server-side move validation using Socket.IO and chess.js.

title: MCP-Powered Terminal AI Assistant
description: A terminal-based AI assistant built with Node.js that leverages MCP for extensible tool-based interactions and automation.

title: AI-Powered Code Review Platform
description: A full-stack code review tool using Google Gemini with syntax highlighting and markdown feedback.

title: Real-Time Voting App
description: Real-time voting app with WebSocket-powered live results and interactive charts.

title: Figma-like Design Tool
description: Interactive web-based canvas tool for creating and manipulating shapes and text with multi-format export options.
